resources.string: I\'m about to download a huge file (>50MB), you might want to be on wifi. Press OK when you\'re ready.

I don't know where this location is. Would you like to find it for me?

 Once you find the right location, longpress on the map to save it and other people can find it too!

 If you find a location that is incorrect you can tap it and vote it down and/or select a different location.
Are you sure this is the correct location?

created by Will Cohen 
 source code: https://code.google.com/p/medi-mouse/ 
 version 2.05
